Serialized Form

Package com.dooapp.gaedo.informer

Class com.dooapp.gaedo.informer.InformerMojo extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

output

File output
Output file where those classes will be written

informerMappings

File informerMappings
Output file where those classes will be written

currentInformerMappings

Properties currentInformerMappings
When InformerMojo.generateMappings is true, this field will contain the mappings loaded from (and later writen to) InformerMojo.informerMappings

generateMappings

boolean generateMappings
Flag indicating if informer mappings file should be generated

project

org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project
Maven project object, used to get sources paths

includes

String[] includes
Sources that will be scanned

excludes

String[] excludes
Defines which of the included files in the source directories to exclude (none by default).

requiredInterfaces

String[] requiredInterfaces
Only classes implementing those interfaces will have their informers generated. Interface name should be fully qualified. Notice that this array is by default empty, which make it require no interface at all.

requiredAnnotations

String[] requiredAnnotations
Only classes having those annotations defined wil have their informers generated Annotation name should be fully qualified.

enums

String[] enums
A list of qualified names of enums containing the enums not in this project source path, but required to be enums.

propertiesExcludes

String[] propertiesExcludes
A list of properties names that should be excluded. Format of properties written here can be in two forms:
  • Simple strings
  • Javadoc-comaptible properties : package.class#property

includeStaticProperties

boolean includeStaticProperties
Define if informers should be generated for static fields. As it's not really interesting to have such a behaviour, it is disabled as default.
